sentences.english: Barking deliriously, the dog bounded towards his mistress .
sentences.chinese: 那只狗兴奋地狂吠着向女主人跑去。

sentences.english: The dog growled at me threateningly.
sentences.chinese: 那条狗对着我狂吠，很吓人。

sentences.english: Stimulus is when a dog barks at you and bares his teeth.
sentences.chinese: 刺激是一条狗冲你狂吠并且露出它的牙齿。

sentences.english: Is not like a dog barking, Luanyao.
sentences.chinese: 得不到就像狗一样狂吠，乱咬。

sentences.english: A barking dog charged at him.
sentences.chinese: 一只狗狂吠着朝他冲来。

sentences.english: It began barking and wouldn't stop. It was the Barts' bulldog.
sentences.chinese: 它开始狂吠，不肯停下，它是巴特家的斗牛狗。

sentences.english: The hunting dog scented a fox in the hole and opened up.
sentences.chinese: 猎犬嗅出洞里有一只狐狸，便狂吠起来。

sentences.english: The dog yapped at the stranger.
A troubled hound was baying the moon.
sentences.chinese: 一条受惊不安的猎狗正在对月狂吠。

sentences.english: The dog swam over to the turtle and started to bark and paw at him.
sentences.chinese: 狗狗游过去追海龟开始狂吠和抓它。

sentences.english: The dogs began to yip and howl, but tonight they kept their places.
sentences.chinese: 狗也摆好阵势，要狂吠了，但是今晚，他们按兵不动。

sentences.english: The lonely traveler was scared by the yip of tykes.
sentences.chinese: 那个孤独的旅行者被野狗的狂吠声给吓坏了。

sentences.english: I wanted to bark at him and bite his head off.
sentences.chinese: 我当时真想向他狂吠然后把他的头咬下来。

sentences.english: Two of the dogs sensed the bear, began barking and ran away.
sentences.chinese: 两只狗闻到了黑熊的味道，开始狂吠，并跑开了。

sentences.english: Sounds created by the wolf may actually be a combination of sounds such as a bark-howl or growl-bark.
sentences.chinese: 狼也会发出混合的叫声像咆哮狂吠，呜咽的吠叫。

definition: to cry out/to bark out a sound
to nod one's head and wag one's tail (idiom)/to be well pleased with oneself/to have a lighthearted air
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
